languages.text: "Ты убиваешь их десятками каждый день ради своего тщеславия!" {n}Маражай снисходительно смеется.{/n} "Я видел, как они гибнут от каждого движения твоего судна. Их сжигает излучение, давит при герметизации, сталкивает в проломы... и все ради того, чтобы корабль пришел в движение. Мон-кай и их методы не считаются с жертвами, когда речь идет о целях их драгоценного Империума — так почему же ты лицемеришь, отказываясь потратить своих слуг на то, что утолит алчущую душу?"

"You kill them by the dozens every day for the sake of your vanity!" {n}Marazhai laughs condescendingly.{/n} "I have seen them perish with every movement of your ship. They are burned by radiation, crushed by pressurisation, pushed into breaches... all for the sake of making this vessel move. Mon-keigh and their methods do not count as sacrifices when it comes to the goals of their precious Imperium — so why are you being hypocritical, refusing to spend your servants on something that will quench a thirsty soul?"
languages.original_text: "Ты убиваешь их десятками каждый день ради своего тщеславия!" {n}Маражай снисходительно смеется.{/n} "Я видел, как они гибнут от каждого движения твоего судна. Их сжигает излучение, давит при герметизации, сталкивает в проломы... и все ради того, чтобы корабль пришел в движение. Мон-кай и их методы не считаются с жертвами, когда речь идет о целях их драгоценного Империума — так почему же ты лицемеришь, отказываясь потратить своих слуг на то, что утолит алчущую душу?"

They are burned by radiation, crushed by pressurisation, pushed into breaches... all for the sake of making this vessel move. Mon-keigh and their methods do not count as sacrifices when it comes to the goals of their precious Imperium — so why are you being hypocritical, refusing to spend your servants on something that will quench a thirsty soul?"

"You kill them by the dozens every day for the sake of your vanity!" {n}Marazhai laughs condescendingly.{/n} "I have seen them perish with every movement of your ship. They are burned by radiation, crushed by pressurisation, pushed into breaches... all for the sake of making this vessel move. Mon-keigh and their methods do not count as sacrifices when it comes to the goals of their precious Imperium — so why are you being hypocritical, refusing to spend your servants on something that will quench a thirsty soul?"

languages.text: “你在虚荣的驱使下，每天都要杀掉几十个人！”{n}玛拉斋居高临下地大笑起来。{/n}“我亲眼看到，只要你的船开起来，那些人就会死。他们被辐射烧死，被高压压死，被机械绞碎……这一切，都是为了能让这艘船动起来。在帝国重要的目标面前，那些猴子的牺牲完全可以忽略不计。既然如此，你又为什么要这么虚伪？你为什么不肯牺牲你的仆人，满足我灵魂的饥渴？”
languages.original_text: "You kill them by the dozens every day for the sake of your vanity!" {n}Marazhai laughs condescendingly.{/n} "I have seen them perish with every movement of your ship. They are burned by radiation, crushed by pressurisation, pushed into breaches... all for the sake of making this vessel move. Mon-keigh and their methods do not count as sacrifices when it comes to the goals of their precious Imperium — so why are you being hypocritical, refusing to spend your servants on something that will quench a thirsty soul?"

traits.locale_text: “你在虚荣的驱使下，每天都要杀掉几十个人！”{n}玛拉斋居高临下地大笑起来。{/n}“我亲眼看到，只要你的船开起来，那些人就会死。他们被辐射烧死，被高压压死，被机械绞碎……这一切，都是为了能让这艘船动起来。在帝国重要的目标面前，那些猴子的牺牲完全可以忽略不计。既然如此，你又为什么要这么虚伪？你为什么不肯牺牲你的仆人，满足我灵魂的饥渴？”

languages.text: "Ihr tötet täglich Dutzende von ihnen, nur um Eure eigene Eitelkeit zu befriedigen!" {n}Marazhai lacht verächtlich.{/n} "Ich habe sie mit jeder Bewegung Eures Schiffs sterben sehen. Sie werden von der Strahlung verbrannt, vom Druck zerquetscht, in Breschen gedrückt ... alles nur, damit dieses Schiff sich bewegen kann. Chem-Pan-Sey und ihre Methoden zählen nicht als Opfer, wenn es um die Ziele ihres geliebten Imperiums geht. Warum seid Ihr also so heuchlerisch und weigert Euch, Eure Diener zu opfern, um eine hungrige Seele zu stillen?"
languages.original_text: "You kill them by the dozens every day for the sake of your vanity!" {n}Marazhai laughs condescendingly.{/n} "I have seen them perish with every movement of your ship. They are burned by radiation, crushed by pressurisation, pushed into breaches... all for the sake of making this vessel move. Mon-keigh and their methods do not count as sacrifices when it comes to the goals of their precious Imperium — so why are you being hypocritical, refusing to spend your servants on something that will quench a thirsty soul?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr tötet täglich Dutzende von ihnen, nur um Eure eigene Eitelkeit zu befriedigen!" {n}Marazhai lacht verächtlich.{/n} "Ich habe sie mit jeder Bewegung Eures Schiffs sterben sehen. Sie werden von der Strahlung verbrannt, vom Druck zerquetscht, in Breschen gedrückt ... alles nur, damit dieses Schiff sich bewegen kann. Chem-Pan-Sey und ihre Methoden zählen nicht als Opfer, wenn es um die Ziele ihres geliebten Imperiums geht. Warum seid Ihr also so heuchlerisch und weigert Euch, Eure Diener zu opfern, um eine hungrige Seele zu stillen?"

languages.text: « Vous en tuez des dizaines tous les jours rien que pour satisfaire votre orgueil ! {n}dit Marazhai avec un rire condescendant.{/n} Je les ai vus périr à chaque mouvement de votre vaisseau. Ils sont brûlés par les radiations, écrasés par la pressurisation, poussés dans des brèches... et pour quoi ? Uniquement pour que ce vaisseau puisse se déplacer. Les mon-keigh et leurs méthodes ne comptent pas comme des sacrifices tant que cela leur permet d'atteindre les objectifs de leur précieux Imperium, alors pourquoi cette hypocrisie ? Pourquoi refuser de dépenser des serviteurs pour satisfaire une âme affamée ? »
languages.original_text: "You kill them by the dozens every day for the sake of your vanity!" {n}Marazhai laughs condescendingly.{/n} "I have seen them perish with every movement of your ship. They are burned by radiation, crushed by pressurisation, pushed into breaches... all for the sake of making this vessel move. Mon-keigh and their methods do not count as sacrifices when it comes to the goals of their precious Imperium — so why are you being hypocritical, refusing to spend your servants on something that will quench a thirsty soul?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous en tuez des dizaines tous les jours rien que pour satisfaire votre orgueil ! {n}dit Marazhai avec un rire condescendant.{/n} Je les ai vus périr à chaque mouvement de votre vaisseau. Ils sont brûlés par les radiations, écrasés par la pressurisation, poussés dans des brèches... et pour quoi ? Uniquement pour que ce vaisseau puisse se déplacer. Les mon-keigh et leurs méthodes ne comptent pas comme des sacrifices tant que cela leur permet d'atteindre les objectifs de leur précieux Imperium, alors pourquoi cette hypocrisie ? Pourquoi refuser de dépenser des serviteurs pour satisfaire une âme affamée ? »

languages.text: «¡Pero si los matas por docenas por orgullo!». {n}Marazhai ríe, condescendiente.{/n} «Los he visto morir cada vez que esta nave se mueve. Quemados por la radiación, aplastados por la presión, empujados a brechas... y todo para que la nave se mueve. Los mon-keigh y sus métodos no parecen contar como sacrificios cuando se trata de los objetivos de su preciado Imperium... Entonces, ¿a qué viene esta hipocresía de negarte a gastar sirvientes en saciar la sed de mi alma?».
languages.original_text: "You kill them by the dozens every day for the sake of your vanity!" {n}Marazhai laughs condescendingly.{/n} "I have seen them perish with every movement of your ship. They are burned by radiation, crushed by pressurisation, pushed into breaches... all for the sake of making this vessel move. Mon-keigh and their methods do not count as sacrifices when it comes to the goals of their precious Imperium — so why are you being hypocritical, refusing to spend your servants on something that will quench a thirsty soul?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Pero si los matas por docenas por orgullo!». {n}Marazhai ríe, condescendiente.{/n} «Los he visto morir cada vez que esta nave se mueve. Quemados por la radiación, aplastados por la presión, empujados a brechas... y todo para que la nave se mueve. Los mon-keigh y sus métodos no parecen contar como sacrificios cuando se trata de los objetivos de su preciado Imperium... Entonces, ¿a qué viene esta hipocresía de negarte a gastar sirvientes en saciar la sed de mi alma?».

languages.text: 「お前の身勝手な理由で、毎日何十人も殺すのか！」{n}マラズハイはまるで見下すかのように笑う。{/n}「お前の船が移動するたびに奴らが死ぬのを、俺は見てきた。放射能に焼かれ、圧力に押しつぶされ、裂け目に押し込まれる…全ては、この船を動かすために。モン＝ケイのやった事は、帝国の目標のためであれば、犠牲のうちに入らない。なぜお前は偽善者ぶっている？渇いた魂を癒すために、下僕を使おうとしないのだ？」
languages.original_text: "You kill them by the dozens every day for the sake of your vanity!" {n}Marazhai laughs condescendingly.{/n} "I have seen them perish with every movement of your ship. They are burned by radiation, crushed by pressurisation, pushed into breaches... all for the sake of making this vessel move. Mon-keigh and their methods do not count as sacrifices when it comes to the goals of their precious Imperium — so why are you being hypocritical, refusing to spend your servants on something that will quench a thirsty soul?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前の身勝手な理由で、毎日何十人も殺すのか！」{n}マラズハイはまるで見下すかのように笑う。{/n}「お前の船が移動するたびに奴らが死ぬのを、俺は見てきた。放射能に焼かれ、圧力に押しつぶされ、裂け目に押し込まれる…全ては、この船を動かすために。モン＝ケイのやった事は、帝国の目標のためであれば、犠牲のうちに入らない。なぜお前は偽善者ぶっている？渇いた魂を癒すために、下僕を使おうとしないのだ？」

languages.text: "Kibrin uğruna her gün onlarcasını öldürüyorsun!" {n}Marazhai, küçümsercesine kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Geminin her bir hareketiyle nasıl da canlarından olduklarını gördüm. Radyasyonla yandılar, basınç altında ezildiler, oyuklardan itildiler... Hepsi, bu geminin hareket etmesini sağlamak içindi. Mon-keighler ve yöntemleri, kıymetli İmparatorluklarının gayeleri söz konusu olduğunda fedakârlık olarak görülmüyor. Peki sen niye bu kadar riyakârsın? Bir ruhun susuzluğunu giderecek bir hususta hizmetkârlarını harcamayı neden reddediyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "You kill them by the dozens every day for the sake of your vanity!" {n}Marazhai laughs condescendingly.{/n} "I have seen them perish with every movement of your ship. They are burned by radiation, crushed by pressurisation, pushed into breaches... all for the sake of making this vessel move. Mon-keigh and their methods do not count as sacrifices when it comes to the goals of their precious Imperium — so why are you being hypocritical, refusing to spend your servants on something that will quench a thirsty soul?"

Radyasyonla yandılar, basınç altında ezildiler, oyuklardan itildiler... Hepsi, bu geminin hareket etmesini sağlamak içindi. Mon-keighler ve yöntemleri, kıymetli İmparatorluklarının gayeleri söz konusu olduğunda fedakârlık olarak görülmüyor. Peki sen niye bu kadar riyakârsın? Bir ruhun susuzluğunu giderecek bir hususta hizmetkârlarını harcamayı neden reddediyorsun?"
